headline: Textron ESG Milestones And New Director Shape Governance And Capital Story
summary: Kautex Textron received an A score for Climate Change and higher Water Security scores, marking key ESG milestones. Textron (NYSE:TXT) reported these Kautex ESG outcomes as part of its broader sustainability efforts. Textron appointed Cristina Méndez, an experienced international finance executive, to its Board of Directors. The board appointment and ESG recognition represent recent changes in governance and sustainability positioning. For you as an investor, NYSE:TXT sits at the...
